item.title: IBM Platform HPC 4.1.1: Creating a network bridge on compute nodes
item.description: Applies to IBM Platform HPC V4.1.1 IBM Platform Cluster Manager V4.1.1 Introduction IBM Platform HPC provides the ability to customise the network configuration of compute nodes via Network Profiles.
